snippet: The British billionaire Philip Green sold a 25 percent stake in the Topshop retail chain to the American private equity firm Leonard Green & Partners, which co-owns the J. Crew brand.
abstract: The British billionaire Philip Green sold a 25 percent stake in the Topshop retail chain to the American private equity firm Leonard Green & Partners, which co-owns the J. Crew brand.

headline.main: Billionaire Sells Stake in Topshop for $805 Million
